Title: A Silent Voice: The Movie
Writer: Yoshitoki Oima (manga: "Koe no katachi"), Reiko Yoshida (screenplay), Kiyoshi Shigematsu (original author: "Curry Rice")
Actors: Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami, Aoi Yûki, Kenshô Ono
Plot: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.
